title: Perma ban?
body:
WHAT FOR? Simple as this....
No information about it.. NOTHJING!!!


WTF is going on? I ask for a email change as I no longer have access to it. THEN BANG.. Prema ban?

COME ON!! Tell my why I was perma ban? Fair is fair. You perma ban me for email change?

replies.body:
Hey there,

It's possible your account was locked due to security concerns with the email change.

If you were doing this change via a support ticket then please continue to follow up with that support rep about the ban.

If not, or if you're unable to re-open or reply to that ticket then you'll have to [submit a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding your ban and a Player Support rep will help you as soon as possible.

I guess I wont know for 4 days from now when riot replys with a auto reply that has nothing to do with anything...
I am sorry but I now understand why this game is going down hill.

They ban people that ask for a email change.. The dynamic group queue system no one likes. The customer service is non-existence...
